title: Carrots
description: Carrot is a root vegetable, usually orange in colour.

title: Cucumbers
description: A long, green-skinned fruit with watery flesh, usually eaten raw in salads

title: Avocadoes
description: A pear-shaped fruit with a rough leathery skin and smooth, oily edible flesh

title: Spinach
description: Large dark green leaves which are widely eaten as a vegetable

title: Tomatoes
description: A glossy red, or occasionally yellow, pulpy edible fruit that is eaten as a vegetable or in salad.

title: Broccoli
description: Edible green plant in the cabbage family  whose large flowering head, stalk and small associated leaves are eaten as a vegetable.

title: Lemons
description: A pale yellow oval citrus fruit with thick skin and fragrant, acidic juice.

title: Onions
description: A swollen edible bulb used as a vegetable.

title: Ginger
description: A hot, fragrant spice made from the rhizome of a plant, which may be chopped or powdered for cooking, preserved in syrup, or candied.

title: Sweet potatoes
description: an edible tropical tuber with white slightly sweet flesh.

title: Peanuts
description: The oval seed of a tropical South American plant, often roasted and salted and eaten as a snack.
